concept.title: Remote Script
concept.shortdesc: Remote scripts are loaded by providing the full URL to the script.

conbody.p: Remote Scripts can be loaded synchronously or asynchronously. If you are loading frameworks, such as jQuery, that you want to use throughout the page, we recommending loading these scripts synchronously. This ensures that any functions defined are available to other elements on the page.
Functions and other code defined in script tags cannot be used in the <head> element on the page since that loads before the page code.
